TopicTitle: How to have Resources and Navball default to visible?

Articles.Content: I would love it if I could always have my Resources panel default to showing all the time rather than have to manually turn it on at the beginning of every flight. Same for the Navball in Map view. Any way to default these guys to visible at launch?
Not that I'm aware of, but I also would like the Navball in Map view to default to being visible.
